description: Permanently removes a FlexMatch matchmaking configuration. To delete, specify the configuration name. A matchmaking configuration cannot be deleted if it is being used in any active matchmaking tickets. Operations related to match configurations and rule sets include:    CreateMatchmakingConfiguration     DescribeMatchmakingConfigurations     UpdateMatchmakingConfiguration     DeleteMatchmakingConfiguration     CreateMatchmakingRuleSet     DescribeMatchmakingRuleSets     ValidateMatchmakingRuleSet
